name: Escape Adventure
description:
Can You Escape - Holidays - Out Now!

Welcome young warrior. In these hard times we have no time to waste. Are you ready for your samurai training? Please remember that everything you do is to reclaim the former honor of your family! So jump into this spiritual world and search for the way to the ancient temple and find the legendary katana and armour that once belonged to your family! In this awesome escape game you have to solve many puzzles and riddles, search for hidden clues and objects and most important - reclaim the honor of your house!

Download this adventure game now and find out if you are able to think and act like a true samurai warrior!
